ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.data

Class SModel<V extends SView<SModel>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.data.SModel<V>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Story

    public class SModel<V extends SView<SModel>>
extends java.lang.Object
    A Model class that all Story Model Classes should extend. Contains the Necessary methods to be an actual Story Model

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SModel()
      Sole Constructor for a SModel, initializes our list of views.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addView(V view)
      Adds a view to our list of views that will updated whenever we are updated.
      void deleteView(V view)
      Removes a view from our list of views.
      This should be called whenever a View is dying, so that we don't keep a reference to it or try to update it when it is dead.
      void notifyViews()
      Notifies our list of views that we have been updated, and calls each of their update(SModel) methods which should update them

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SModel

        public SModel()
        Sole Constructor for a SModel, initializes our list of views.

    • Method Detail

      • addView

        public void addView(V view)
        Adds a view to our list of views that will updated whenever we are updated. The view will only be added if it isn't already included in our list of views
        Parameters:
        view - The view to add to our list of views

      • deleteView

        public void deleteView(V view)
        Removes a view from our list of views.
        This should be called whenever a View is dying, so that we don't keep a reference to it or try to update it when it is dead.
        Parameters:
        view - the View to remove from our list of views.

      • notifyViews

        public void notifyViews()
        Notifies our list of views that we have been updated, and calls each of their update(SModel) methods which should update them
